quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因“eco-”与“economic”混淆将“ecotourism”误解为“经济旅游”，或忽略“eco-”前缀将其等同于“旅游”。
quiz_item.sentence: Many countries in Southeast Asia are promoting **ecotourism** to attract visitors who want to experience nature while supporting local conservation efforts.

option.definition: 生态旅游（指前往自然区域、支持保护工作的负责任旅游）
